Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2009 12:54PM marpatn wrote: Had my lumpdectomy last wednesday was healing good then monday fluid could be heard in my breast and sore from the weight of the fluid last night itching under arm pit looked and a hive like rash was there very itchy and side of neck on the same side as surgery was rash no where else on body. Had 12 staples in breast at incision sight and 12 stables under arm for 1 node removal any one else have staples, hives etc.
Posts.Title: post lumpectomy pain JenP2008 Sukiann

Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2009 11:20AM marpatn wrote: was just told yesterday that my biopsy came back possitive for cancer, I am in shock,he wants blood work and other test done next week, don't know much more of what that found. I am 63 years old
